models.moves

Class BasicMove

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.moves.Move
      • models.moves.BasicMove

  • public class BasicMove
extends Move
    Create an object manipulating a standard move. It enables the use of a move (attack/hazard, defense/remedy, distance, safety) in the standard playing stream.
    Version:
    1.1.2
    Author:
    Simon RENOULT

        public boolean cardAndPlayerStackAreCompatible(Player targetPlayer)
                                        throws IllegalMoveException
        Perform card to stack verification. -- > Distance : -- > Initial GoRoll is not played : -- > IMPOSSIBLE. -- > Initial GoRoll is played : -- > Attacked and not protected : -- > IMPOSSIBLE. -- > Not attacked: -- > Slowed and > 50 -- > IMPOSSIBLE. -- > Hazard : -- > Protected -- > IMPOSSIBLE. -- > Already attacked/slowed. -- > IMPOSSIBLE. -- > Remedy : -- > Speed -- > GoStop -- > Else -- > Safety :

      • targetIsCompatible

        public boolean targetIsCompatible(Player targetPlayer)
                           throws IllegalMoveException
        Description copied from class: Move
        Perform a verification on target player. As the verification content depends on the type of move, the method is set as abstract and is used through a final method : Move.setTarget(Player).
        Specified by:
        targetIsCompatible in class Move
        Returns:
        True if the target is compatible , else false.
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveException
